Yonkers.Christ Church (Bronx, New York):
Christ Church Riverdale is a historic Episcopal parish church and related structures at 5030 He ru Hudson Parkway in the Riverdale area of The Bronx in New York City.
The church was founded in 1866 and its building, made from brick and local stone with a simple pierced-wall belfry; the church building was built in 1866 to designs by architect Richard M. Upjohn. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1983.
